data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 786,800 citizens of the the county of Datia.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Datia, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Datia, Madhya Pradesh, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Datia that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Datia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Vasudev people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Datia, Madhya Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Datia, Madhya Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,655 believers in Datia to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

location.name: Datia
